comments_since_last_sample.body: I thought the song was super bland, it didn't go anywhere not even at the end when you would expect a little more instrumental in the back for the final chorus, but instead it was just the same throughout. The music video was also messy, none of the shots really meshed well at all it was like there were three different music videos in one and none of them were good besides lisa's parts but they were jarring to see mixed into the video.
The MV is really boring and the music is utter trash.
